email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is $42 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, 2023. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of $42/MT is higher than our current budget. We are looking to secure a rate closer to $38/MT. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount?

Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Charterer Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering your request, we can offer a revised rate of $40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $40/MT is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Charterer Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

The laytime will start on October 10, 2023, and end on October 15, 2023. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Michael Brown
Charterer Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
